articles.description: What’s next in the Candy Crush saga?
articles.content: THE GAME is on. Or so ruled an American appeals court on July 14th when it threw out another effort by the Federal Trade Commission to block Microsofts $69bn acquisition of Activision Blizzard, a gam… [+2306 chars]
